amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funding for research and related activities for the National Science Foundation by $1,248,473,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funding for research and related activities for the National Science Foundation.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 121 - 291 (Roll no. 217).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Flake amendment (A025) Failed by recorded vote: 121 - 291 (Roll no. 217).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A025) offered by Mr. Flake.
